name: Hulil Lutan

trait.name: Dark Devotion
text: Hulil has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Hulil is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). Hulil has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon
